description: We get around a lot these days.  As a matter of fact we just bumped into that hot boy next door, Cody Cummings! The chiseled, hung, straight superstar makes his Hot House debut in a sizzling Backroom Exclusive Video shot in a sunny loft in San Francisco. Cody takes his time getting naked and working his fat cock until he blows his load.
title: Backroom Exclusives 7, Scene #06
